You have forged a pact with Siogarithax, the Dragonknight. In exchange, she has granted you @UUID[Compendium.the-longest-mile.spells.Bf6icD7q57eAtNr4]{Divine Lance} as a divine innate cantrip using your Intelligence or Charisma modifier

Finally, you gain access to spells from the Cosmos mystery. At 1st level, you gain a cantrip and a 1st-level spell. You learn the other spells on the list as soon as you gain the ability to cast spells of that level. For you, they are not treated as Focus Spells and their focus level is replaced by a regular spell level.

Granted Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
